dkeep.logic.Hero

      Hero Keep.get_hero()

      Obtains Hero
      Hero Dungeon.get_hero() 
      Methods in dkeep.logic with parameters of type Hero 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Person.check_near(Hero person)
      Checks if the player has lost, meaning if the hero is on one of the adjacent squares (except diagonals) to the person (guard, ogre or club)
      boolean Ogre.check_near(Hero person)
      Checks if Hero is in one of the adjacent cells to Ogre so that he can stun him, or maybe attack the Hero.
      boolean Drunken.check_near(Hero person) 
      void Map.draw_hero(Hero draw)
      Opens doors if the hero has caught key and changes him to a new character: its key symbol
